subject: World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
Soccer
lead_paragraph: Long ridiculed with terms such as “chicken man” and “lettuce hands,” Brazilian goalkeepers received a huge boost when Júlio César helped propel his team past Chile and into the World Cup quarterfinals.
snippet: Long ridiculed with terms such as “chicken man” and “lettuce hands,” Brazilian goalkeepers received a huge boost when Júlio César helped propel his team past Chile and into the World Cup quarterfinals.
